name: Mustafa
about: Hello, my name is Mustafa ÜNLÜ. I am striving to improve myself in Android app development and I am 25 years old. I am improving myself in Android application development with Kotlin and I am proficient in basic programming principles in this area. I also have knowledge of technologies used in mobile application development. I try to constantly improve myself and follow the latest trends in the industry. I try to acquire knowledge from Android and Kotlin technical documentation. Moreover, I am open to learning and developing myself. I would be happy to collaborate and gain experience by participating in projects to gain more experience in the industry.

portfolio.title: Rick and Morty App
portfolio.description: This app follows MVVM architecture and uses Coroutines, Flow & LiveData with Android Architecture Components. It has a single-activity architecture with Jetpack Navigation and uses Android Hilt for dependency injection. Retrofit, Moshi, and Glide are used for networking and media management.

portfolio.title: Quiz App
portfolio.description: This Android app uses Coroutines, Flow & LiveData with Android Architecture Components. It has a single-activity architecture with Jetpack Navigation and uses Android Hilt, Retrofit, and Room. This library collection helps design robust, testable, and maintainable apps.

portfolio.title: Kotlin Learning Project
portfolio.description: This is a repository where I share my notes on the Kotlin language, and add new things that I am learning on a daily basis.

portfolio.title: Android Dokümantasyonu Türkçe Çeviri Projesi
portfolio.description: https://mustfaunlu.github.io/ adresinde Android Dokümantasyonu Türkçe Çeviri Projesi'ni yayınladım. Bu proje ile Android geliştirme alanında Türkçe kaynak eksikliğini gidermeyi amaçlıyorum.

portfolio.title: Autobiography App
portfolio.description: This app follows MVVM architecture and uses Coroutines, Flow & LiveData with Android Architecture Components. It has a single-activity architecture with Jetpack Navigation and uses Android Hilt for dependency injection. Retrofit, Moshi, and Glide are used for networking and media management.

portfolio.title: My Hackerrank Adventure
portfolio.description: I share my hackerrank solutions in this repository.
